title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observing classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The teacher looks strict and I want to be accepted by the group.

action: Adjust uniform collar to ensure perfect compliance while maintaining eye contact with teacher
thoughts: The teacher is checking uniforms closely - I need to make sure everything is perfect to avoid losing points. Following the rules is the best way to stay accepted here.
memory: Maintaining proper appearance is crucial for social acceptance
Determined to avoid any disciplinary deductions

action: Maintain rigid posture while subtly adjusting uniform to ensure compliance
thoughts: The teacher is still distracted but I must remain perfectly compliant. My uniform needs to be impeccable to avoid any disciplinary deductions and maintain social standing in this experiment.
memory: Completed self-uniform check to ensure compliance with classroom rules
Remains vigilant about maintaining proper appearance for social acceptance

action: Continue observing teacher's movements while maintaining rigid posture and discreetly checking nearby students' uniforms
thoughts: The teacher seems distracted but I must remain vigilant. I notice subtle glances between other students - this could lead to disciplinary issues. I should maintain perfect compliance while observing others to ensure I'm following the group norms correctly.
memory: Noticed subtle non-verbal communication between other students
Remains focused on maintaining perfect compliance with classroom rules
Observing both teacher behavior and peer interactions to gauge proper conduct

Continued focus on following rules to maintain social acceptance
